title: Like Water for Chocolate 1992 480p WEB-DL x264 AAC
description:
NOTE: Has hardcoded English subtitles since film is in Spanish.

Like Water for Chocolate (1992)

Like Water for Chocolate is a film adaptation of the same name written by Laura Esquivel. It is a story of magical realism set in Mexico, and tells of the story of Tita, the youngest daughter of the de la Garza family. Tita is not permitted by her mother Mama Elena to marry due to a family tradition; however, she falls in love with Pedro Muzquiz, and their passionate love for each other is tested to its limits - as Mama Elena tries to separate them by making Pedro marry Rosaura. Despite this, Tita and Pedro's love for each other still stands, as Tita eventually stands up for herself against her mother...

SOURCE:

Like Water for Chocolate 1992 720p WEB-DL AAC 2.0 H.264-HDStar

* AAC audio stream from this reencode is the exact copy of the original, no transcoding

WHY?

For the very few people who might need it and want to have a smaller-sized version of the film, since it's an adaptation of the acclaimed novel 'Like Water for Chocolate'.
